levels.description:
Immediately trigger the first talent. Attack Interval is <@ba.vup>reduced significantly</> and increase ATK to <@ba.vup>{ash_s_2[atk_scale].atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking <$ba.stun>Stunned</> targets
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants 31 bullets and the skill ends when all bullets are used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
